review:
Dr. Pradeep Kumar, is a very calm, supportive, clear and assuring doctor. He listens to all our queries peacefully & clarifies on every point however silly/naïve the questions are. 
We take his consultation for our 6-month old princess, Dr Pradeep Kumar monitors & updates the growth of our baby on every visit. As a first time parents we pose several questions to him, which he responds to us on call/emails & answers to all our queries. ** ** *** **** ************ ********* ** ***** We recommend other first time parents to take his consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went to Dr.pradeep for my kid unwellness. Baby has cold, high fever and cough related issues. Doctor diagnosis the problem well and the treatment for my kid is nice and perfect with less medicines. I strongly recommend him for your kid speedy recovery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Friendly and explains the problem and steps of treatment clearly. Takes ownership of the patient and cares about the baby. This time we really had difficult time as the baby had continuous fever, vomiting and loose motion for more than a week. He is pro active and shows interest in the well being of the patient.
Dr. Pradeep is very friendly and gave complete attention to our Son.  Will recommend him to others as well. Thank you
Doctor was fine. The nurse staff at motherhood (Margaret) was not friendly and very un-understanding in way she approached patients. Wait time was almost 2 hours. She was screaming on patients.

review: Not good experience because he didn't ask anything for baby .we went for health checkup and vaccination but he has not responded well and we are asking something and saying something.
He is very friendly and always available on call and breastfeeding friendly. Prescribe very less medicine
My mom travels from native and get my baby for checkup. Doctor is very fast. He has to give time for us to explain the problem and listen with patience. But he prescribes well. So we trust him.

Very good doctor, who can read patient's mind without asking so much, timely decision taken to cure my child.I am very impressed.
Thank you,
He is a very good doctor have lot of patience he s very friendly with all patients very good  behaviour he solve all the dobuts
He has been paediatrician for my baby from last 7 months  and has always provided the absolute best care, and I believe, best advice and treatment during every visit and for every issue.

Very good experiance and i feel the doctor is very much reachable in case of any emergency...

Regards,
Manju
Very Good...talk very smoothly explain the situation and route causes... Prescribe very less medicine and try to control naturally
Had a good experience with Dr. Pradeep Kumar. Given some medicine to my daugher. She is feeling much better after started taking the course.

We went for our baby boy 9 months vaccination due and as per the chart provided by the hospital doctor advised for the vaccination and also we have got information nutrition chart for our baby and he advised us in proper way.
Excellent  .friendly. Approach. Handling. Of  baby. Good.good  tips given  on other. Issues on babies food habits .health.and handling.overall  a recommended doctor.
Doctor treated my kids well..he communicates with us very nicely so that we can explain a-z about the problem..listens to patients problems correctly n prescribes good medicines..
He is taking maximum care .I felt very happy to visit ur hospital. Thank you very much for providing nice facilities.
Very friendly in nature.Explains the causes of the problem very well and gives minimal medicines to cure.

He is very good at what he does , he recognises issues very easily and makes sure the correct medicines are prescribed, never have we face an issue with drug reaction in a bad way considering its for a baby. 
Always nice to the baby and talks to us and makes us feel good and that the issue faced isn't impossible to treat, gives us confidence. 
Thank you

Excellent doctor. We are very happy with Dr. Pradeep. He is very humble, nice and genuine doctor. He will help you to understand the problem and share the permanent solution. We are very much happy with Dr. Pradeep. We definitely recommend to our friends and colleagues.

He is cool and attends people in good way. He takes some time to understand the problem and and then gives solution. In today's busy world dedicating little extra time towards the patient gives confidence not only to the patient but also to the doctor to understand the individual.
